title: Pushpa Haaram: Floral Splendor Necklace
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Crafted with Hyderabadi precision.
features: This exquisite necklace features a modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram, showcasing intricately designed floral motifs. Each flower is meticulously crafted with rose quartz petals surrounded by sparkling CZ diamonds, creating a captivating visual appeal. The setting is designed to maximize light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the stones. The delicate gold chain complements the floral design, ensuring a comfortable and elegant fit.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. A stunning statement piece for a modern bride or any woman seeking a touch of elegance.
description: This Pushpa Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The use of high-quality rose quartz and sparkling CZ diamonds offers a luxurious look without compromising on affordability. A timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. Made with meticulous craftsmanship, this necklace exudes sophistication and grace, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. The Floral design is very versatile and can be paired with both traditional and modern outfits.
